amendatorysection.catchline: Electric companies; rate regulations; violation; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Any person, firm or corporation, their employees, agents or servants, who shall violate any of the provisions of sections 70-407 and 70-408 shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.

annotation.para: The railway commission does not have power to inflict the penalties provided for in this section. Miller v. Iowa-Nebraska Light & Power Co., 129 Neb. 757, 262 N.W. 855 (1935).
